events.description: Player attempted to Look around carefully and observe my surroundings using Investigation. Outcome: tie
New Quest: Seeking the Orb of Forgotten Power

metadata.title: Seeking the Orb of Forgotten Power
metadata.description: The ancient artifact known as the Orb of Forgotten Power lies hidden within The Shattered Sanctum. Legends say it holds the key to restoring balance in the shattered realms.

objectives.description: Navigate through the Catacombs of Shadows and uncover its secrets.
Unlock the ancient wards surrounding the Orb on the altar.

events.description: Player attempted to Examine any interesting features nearby using Investigation. Outcome: failure
Quest Update: Seeking the Orb of Forgotten Power - Navigate through the Catacombs of Shadows and uncover its secrets.
